text: An art game is a video game where art is very important and sometimes is the main point. Other times, the main point is to make people think. Most of the time, art games look very new and artistic.Play, Pushing. Video Game Blogs. Format Magazine. 5 November 2008. ==References== ==Other websites== *Artificial.dk Collection of Recommended Art Games *Games Are Art Website *56Kmodern: Explorations on the intersection of games and art Category:Art games Category:Video game genres
title: Art game
